about_the_game:
Explore the beautiful artwork of Beacon Pines. The Art of Beacon Pines is a 203 page art book detailing the environments, the characters and the making of Beacon Pines.



Featuring early concept art by developer Matt Meyer, and sketches, character art and environments from artist Ilse Harting, the book offers insights on the development and a behind-the-scenes look at the games characters and how the town of Beacon Pines was born.

To access the art book:


  • Right click Beacon Pines in your Steam Library
  • Select Manage
  • Select Browse Local Files
  • Open the Artbook folder
The art book will be downloaded to this Steam folder in PDF format.

Explore the beautiful artwork of Beacon Pines. The Art of Beacon Pines is a 203 page art book detailing the environments, the characters and the making of Beacon Pines.



Featuring early concept art by developer Matt Meyer, and sketches, character art and environments from artist Ilse Harting, the book offers insights on the development and a behind-the-scenes look at the games characters and how the town of Beacon Pines was born.

To access the art book:


  • Right click Beacon Pines in your Steam Library
  • Select Manage
  • Select Browse Local Files
  • Open the Artbook folder
The art book will be downloaded to this Steam folder in PDF format.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: Intel i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible GPU
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Explore the beautiful artwork of Beacon Pines with this 203 page art book featuring sketches, character art and environments from artist Ilse Harting.
